say_hi[source]

say_hi(to)

Enthusiastically say hi to someone

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hi("Helena")

'Hii Helena!'
{% endraw %}

FastCore tests

This is the same as assert say_hi("bla") == "Hii bla"

{% raw %} 
test_eq(say_hi("Alex"),"Hii Alex!")
{% endraw %}
